insert into Seller_goods (id, emp_id, contract_id, school_id, end_time, dateline)
select #{item.id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.empId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.contractId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.schoolId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.endTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.dateline,jdbcType=VARCHAR} from dual
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM Seller_goods WHERE emp_id=#{empId} AND contract_id=#{contractId}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM Seller_goods WHERE emp_id=#{empId} and contract_id=#{contractId}
mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT sg.emp_id,sg.SCHOOL_ID,sg.CONTRACT_ID, le.emp_name, le.emp_cover, le.EMP_MOBILE,co.NAME as school_name, sg.END_TIME FROM Seller_goods sg LEFT JOIN lx_emp le on sg.emp_id=le.emp_id LEFT JOIN college co on sg.school_id=co.coid WHERE sg.contract_id=#{empId} and le.emp_id is NOT NULL
